reviews.review: 刚开始玩这游戏就匹配到4段的，不过后来好多了，但是基本上还是每一局都是段位比我高的，只能当成负重练习了，很难玩啊。还没有一个适应期就直接上战场了，而且都是比我高好几个段位的。还是比较希望能在自定义中出个机器人的，这样可以自己慢慢练技术，也不至于一个人都抓不到，然后气愤的想退款时却退不了了。还有，我屠夫匹配一局至少十几分钟，进去他们速修几分钟就结束了，玩起来真的没意思，不反对速修，但是这匹配时长，真的劝退。不过总体来说游戏还是很好的，值得推荐。
yes
为什么更新以后就会crash啊啊啊
玩过的最烂的游戏之一，bug多到不行，又是网络错误又是段位更新，一大堆乱七八糟的问题，游戏制作组明明知道这些问题也不去修复，越玩越糟心，屠夫和人类越来越不平衡，外挂也是一抓一大堆，垃圾

Бл@ть, как у меня бомбит. Сук@, игра такая помойка. Мало того, чтобы играть нужно за игру заплатить. Так чтобы прокачиваться в игре, и играть за новых сурвов/манов нужно платить. Самые умные фанатики данной игры скажут, что можно копить радужные осколки  и за них покупать маньяков и выживших. Но бл@ть, во первых я наиграл 382 часа. И за всё это время я купил только 3 маньяков, повторяю 3 ЗА ВСЁ ВРЕМЯ. А теперь давайте вспомним сколько маньяков за осколки продаются. Да, да, не все маньяки продаются за осколки. Некоторый маны только за донат. И так, 9 манов продаются за осколки. Тоесть примерно 900 часов на понадобится, чтобы получить большую половину манов в игре. И это только маньяки. Я про выживших вообще молчу. 

Двигаемся дальше, про перки скажу лишь пару слов. 80% - перков хлам. Ты ими точно пользоваться не будешь. А ну и ещё, забыл упомянуть про крепкий орешек. Который к сожалению работает через жопу. Ты его используешь, и так скажем не можешь при его использование получить урон. К сожалению разработчики рукожопы и не могут сделать перк. Так как это *не получение урона* работает только через пол секунды после его активации. И к сожалению тебе всё время придётся его прожимать заранее. А это крайне не удобно.

А теперь я бы хотел побомбить о чате. ГДЕ ОН СYKA? Я конечно всё понимаю. Но ХОТЯ-БЫ в саму игру его добавить можно. Нaфuг мне он в лобби? Приведу банальную ситуацию. Я лежу на земле и у меня действует осколок. 2 человека сбежало. Один в среднем от меня дистанции. Стоит на люке, пока я лежал на земле я фиг знаю, что у него люк. Ну ладно, дальше ман хочет меня поднять но видет как сел приседает на люке и идёт к нему. И СYKA, В ТАКИХ МОМЕНТАХ НУЖЕН ЧАТ. Я бы тогда написал, чтобы он сбегал. Но нет, я не могу из-за тупых разрабов. В итоге ман идёт к тому челу, тот чел сбегает. И у меня заканчивается осколок. Ну спс игра.

Ранговая система с одно стороны норм, но с другой xyeta. Чтобы получить эмблемы надо из кожи вон лезть. Часто в пати приходилось ману подоваться, чтобы хоть в +1 к рангу выйти. 

Это конечно не все проблемы игры, их ГОРАЗДО больше. Не хочу затягивать ваше и своё время. Так, что решайте сами покупать игру или нет.

Before I start this, I play both Survivor and Killer equally.

This game at it's core is so much fun but in it's current state is horrible. The game currently is INCREDIBLY Survivor biased and the Developers are very incompetent and continue to nerf and nerf Killers to the point where it's stressful to play Killer, especially at the higher ranks.

This game also has one of the most CANCEROUS communities I've ever had the chance to be involved with.

Do I recommend this game? Yes and No.

Yes because like I said earlier, It's fun at it's core.
No because there are so many issues that the dev's refuse to fix current issues and are just so incompetent overall. BHVR is slowly climbing the ladder to becoming my top 3 most incompetent developers.

-2 points for a cancerous community and incompetent dev's.

6/10

Okay, after a while, I finally understood why I don't recommend this game, This game is P2W, I don't care what anyone else tells me, if your really going to get far in this game, the base killer perks aren't really gonna help you at all, there is only like 2 killers that have like 1 perk in the base game that is actually worth using, on top of that, the devs have lied to the community by knowingly selling a chapter that supported NFTs, lying to the community saying that they weren't going to support NFTs and then, like a week later after they said they weren't going to support NFTs, announced that the Pinhead chapter is supporting NFTs, so they basically had the entire community that bought the chapter support NFTs and they can't refund it, on top of that, one of the devs said that there were more important things than adding a color blind mode in this game, I mean sure, now they are adding in a color blind mode but, the only reason they are doing that is because that dev made their company look bad and it took them like 5 years to decide to add in a mode that would help people just look at the game on some maps, next the grind in this game, omfg, I have 1000 hours in this game and i only have like 3 or 4 p3 killers and I only play killer so I only have 7 level 50 survivors, this also comes back to my point on the game being p2w, leatherface has a perk called bbq and chilli which basically decreases the grind just by playing the game, and you can only get leatherface by paying 5 dollars, now sure, there is a shrine of secrets where every week, 4 perks, 2 on the killer and 2 on the survivor, show up and you can get them with irredescent shards but, the good perk like never show up, bbq and chilli only showed up like 3 times in the past 5 years, trickstershadow made a video about the grind if you wanna watch it, next, the past like 9 killers besides blight and twins and saduko, who hasn't came out yet, have all been chase focused killers, which makes the game super boring when the only thing you can do to counter them is hold W, next, this game is also filled with hackers now because how trash their code is, it is so bad that a well known hacker in this game said that they could take over this game if they wanted to, overall, don't buy this game, take a word from the lead developer of this game and go play civilization because that is what he said when someone asked him to make a few changes in this game

I've been playing the shit out of this game for the past 2 days. This is a great game. 

Gameplay: Top notch. Epic matches where you think the killer is gonna win, then you turn it around on him with some fucking sick plays. Doing gens is really satisfying and I love the mechanics. 

Community: Honestly, I love the community. Just the right amount of toxicity so I can feed my dark side, but not SO MUCH that it ruins the game for me.

Downsides: None that are really exclusive to this game. There's the occasional, "I PRESSED THE BUTTON OMG WHY DIDNT IT GO OFF", but other than that, this is a pretty solid game.

Dead by Daylight é jogado exclusivamente um jogador contra quatro, onde um jogador assume o papel do assassino selvagem, e os outros quatro jogadores jogam como sobreviventes, tentando escapar do assassino, fazer cinco geradores e abrir a saída para evitar ser pego, torturado e morto.
Como sobrevivente, é possível jogar sozinho ou com amigos para enfrentar um assassino desconhecido. Sobreviventes podem usar itens, habilidades desbloqueadas e objetos do ambiente para enganar o assassino e escapar do seu território. Colocados em mapas processualmente gerados, os objetos do mundo são gerados aleatoriamente, sendo assim, não é possível saber o que está enfrentando e como fugir. Toda decisão afeta suas chances de sobrevivência. Cada sobrevivente tem três habilidades exclusivas que lhe dará uma vantagem ao decorrer da partida. Mais tarde, essas habilidades exclusivas podem ser desbloqueadas em outros sobreviventes. Itens também lhe dão vantagens na partida; com uma lanterna, por exemplo, você pode cegar o assassino para o perder de vista. É possível adquirir itens como lanternas, caixa de ferramentas e caixa de primeiros socorros encontrando-os em baús ou adquirindo com pontos de sangue na teia de sangue recomendo para todos comprar

Esempio: io rank 18 ho cercato una partita e mi ha messo con 3 persone di rank 1 con sotto il nome un numero romano (III) con il teschio (non so cosa significa) e con dei perk rossi e viola madonna.... Vi consiglio 'sto gioco se siete fortunati altrimenti aspettate un aggiornamento apposta... Se mai lo faranno. Ah e ovviamente è sbilanciato e PayToWin.

생존자=조별과제급 팀원과 함께하는 저세상 술래잡기게임
살인마=다인큐, 칼찌, 시계, 티배깅(출구여포), 사보타지, 버그, 아주 ㅈ같은 맵(혐든필드, ㅈ르몬드, 나쁜햄), 그리고 매튜 때문에 영원히 고통받는 1명의 블포생성기 혹은 주머니에 엑스칼리버 한자루와 회중시계를 (거의)무조건들고 다니는 4명의 깡페들의 샌드백(+보레쉬 눈뽕, 티배깅, -클-)

살인마 하지 마세요. 데바데도 하지 마세요. 그리고 제발 티배깅 하지 마세요.
